explains: n. 肥沃，富饶；可繁殖性，生育能力；（思想的）丰富，多产
wordGroup: soil fertility 土壤肥力；地力
fertility rate 生育率；人口出生率

sentences.en: The women were given fertility drugs to stimulate the ovaries.
sentences.cn: 那些妇女得到了促进卵巢功能的生育药。

sentences.en: The fertility of women who smoke is half that of nonsmoking women.
sentences.cn: 吸烟女士的生育能力是非吸烟女士的一半。

sentences.en: Doctors will tell you that pregnancy is the only sure test for fertility.
sentences.cn: 医生们会告诉你怀孕是测试生育能力的惟一准确的方法。
